entry.title: Combined summary - BIP-119 CTV Meeting #3 Draft Agenda for Tuesday February 8th at 12:00 PT
entry.summary: Bitcoin Developers are set to convene for the 3rd instance of their recurring meeting on Tuesday, February 8th at 12:00 PT. The meeting will take place in channel ##ctv-bip-review on the libera.chat IRC server, and it is expected to last for approximately two hours. The proposed agenda encompasses several pertinent topics including Bug Bounty Updates, Non-Interactive Lightning Channels, CTV's "Dramatic" Improvement of DLCs, PathCoin, OP_TXHASH, Emulating CTV for Liquid, and General Discussion.Participants are urged to review the agenda ahead of time and provide any feedback, suggested topic changes, additions, or questions they may have. To facilitate this, the agenda includes links to relevant information that should be examined prior to the meeting. It is worth noting that no requests have been made thus far to add content to the agenda.Jeremy Rubin, the organizer of the meeting, will ensure that attendees receive a reminder containing the finalized agenda before the scheduled gathering. This will serve as a helpful reference point for participants, enabling them to come prepared and contribute effectively to the discussions.In summary, Bitcoin Developers will convene for their 3rd recurring meeting, which is scheduled for February 8th. The meeting will address various important topics, and participants are encouraged to review the agenda and submit any necessary feedback beforehand. Jeremy Rubin will send out a reminder with the finalized agenda to ensure that all attendees are well-informed before the meeting commences.
